title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description:
Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

It takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.

NOTES:
OB: When updating the checked state of the table during the export Zip process, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) and there is no indication that the process is ongoing, such as a busy cursor.
EB: During the export Zip process, the updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor to visually indicate that the process is ongoing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Go to a workspace with multiple projects.
2. Navigate to the export Zip function.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Press the OK button.
